name: ExperiencePoorReason
description: Reasons why the QoE of the local user when receiving a remote audio stream is poor.

parameters.None: 0: No reason, indicating a good QoE of the local user.

parameters.RemoteNetworkQualityPoor: 1: The remote user's network quality is poor.

parameters.LocalNetworkQualityPoor: 2: The local user's network quality is poor.

parameters.WirelessSignalPoor: 4: The local user's Wi-Fi or mobile network signal is weak.

parameters.WifiBluetoothCoexist: 8: The local user enables both Wi-Fi and bluetooth, and their signals interfere with each other. As a result, audio transmission quality is undermined.
